title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-786)
description: On November 26, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)   versions prior to 18.6.1, 18.5.3 and 18.4.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.6.1, 18.5.3 and 18.4.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
